prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that looks playful and loves to dance in the waves.
Imagine a Pokemon with blue fur and bubbles floating around it, perfect for a water-themed party.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the joy of the ocean with bright colors and a cheerful expression.
Generate a cute aquatic creature that can perform tricks and has a lovely singing voice.
Show me a Pokemon that has a graceful swimming style and can use water attacks effectively.
Give me a Pokemon that sparkles with blue and white colors, representing the ocean's beauty.
Make a water-type Pokemon that can create bubbles and has a whimsical appearance.
